title: Penetration Tester - Hardware Security
body:
Company Description

SGS Digital Trust Services provides Cybersecurity research, testing and certification services. Working in partnership with Graz University of Technology (TU Graz) at the Cybersecurity Campus Graz, we operate one of the world's largest Cyber security evaluation labs where security experts focus on testing and certification of digital products, networked systems and online services.


Job Description

The Penetration Tester will evaluate the hardware security on IoT devices. Your job will be to find vulnerabilities and assess their severity.

You Will:

  • Test the vulnerability of the software and hardware layer on electronic products and systems;
  • Apply methodologies and techniques from reverse engineering;
  • Analyze the security of hardware used in electronic products;
  • Investigate hardware based vulnerabilities;
  • Extract firmware and secrets from devices;
  • Conduct threat analysis;
  • Develop scripts, tools or methodologies to facilitate customized testing.

Qualifications
  • Degree, Masters or PhD in Information Technology, Informatics, Electrical and Electronic Engineering, Computer Science Mathematics or a related subject;
  • Experience with tool such as IDA Pro and Ghidra;
  • Knowledge of OWASP Top 10;
  • Experience with various programming languages like C, C++ and Assembly;
  • Experience with embedded software and logic analysers;
  • Knowledge of JTAG, UART and similar interfaces;
  • Knowledge of binary analysis and reverse engineering;
  • Previous experience of conducting penetration tests on IoT devices.

Additional Information

You must be an EU or NATO citizen to be eligible for employment at the Cybersecurity Campus Graz.
